Author: gayprincess96
Text: Look them fully up and down, act really silently disinterested and keep walking

Author: IkarosFalling
Text: Uhg. I just moved to a new city and now people like... Put their hand up to half wave when I catch them looking at me on the street instead of just creep staring and it makes me so uncomfortable. Like at least back home creeps were creeps and I could glare at them and they'd look away like they weren't but here its like they just fucking own it and I should be happy for their gross middle aged man attention. Doesn't matter if I get validation.... They're ugly as fuck and I want the power to shame their ugly mugs.... The wave kills it for me ðŸ˜“
